articles.title: New Year's Eve 2024 live: World welcomes 2025 with fireworks and light shows - BBC.com
articles.description: India is the latest country to see in the new year as cities celebrate with spectacular displays and traditional ceremonies.
articles.content:
Image caption, Students and supporters demonstrate during a 'March for Unity' on New Year's Eve in Dhaka
Bangladesh has welcomed 2025 after a year of significant upheaval.
